Hello,

I would like to be able to control the bandwidth used by Heritrix d=
uring certain hours.

So far, I have seen that I could use sheet overlays t=
o increase the values of properties such as disposition.minDelayMs or dispo=
sition.maxPerHostBandwidthUsageKbSec, so that the politeness delay for all =
the URLs increases. With higher delays, the crawler will make less requests=
 and thus this will control (indirectly) the bandwidth.

I also have seen t=
hat I can use the scripting engine to manage sheet overlays, so I could wri=
te a script that uses the REST API and makes the changes when they are need=
ed (without stopping the job).

Although my approach does not seem to be co=
mplicated to implement (and I try to do it today), I would like to know wha=
t would be the potential problems and if there is a better way of doing tha=
t.

Do you have any advice or have you done anything similar?

Thanks,

Jua=
n Manuel Caicedo
